Luna Node

Luna Node provides high quality unmanaged VPS hosting at an affordable price. We exclusively use KVM on all plans for the greater control that it gives users. At the moment we're offering various plans in Chicago with 512 MB to 8192 MB memory. We take payments through PayPal (either through PayPal account or credit card) and Bitcoin.

Budget plans come with RAID10 HDD storage and 5 IPv4 addresses (or, get 13 IPv4 addresses for $3.00/mo over standard prices; note that justification is required for this upgrade). SSD KVM plans come with a single IPv4 address and SSD storage. SSD KVM is backed up weekly.

On Budget VPS, we offer a custom VM control panel that features the typical management options (although we're currently still using SolusVM for our SSD KVM plans). Servers are provisioned out of SingleHop's Chicago datacenter.

All plans come with a free single-domain/wildcard AlphaSSL certificate (additional certificates are $2/yr). cPanel VM licenses are available at $10/mo.

Order budget VPS or SSD KVM now! Or contact us for questions. Upload your PGP public key to our PGP web interface to receive encrypted mail from us.
